title: 0xc0000005 Error

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Every time the game exits to champ select, it doesn't go into the loading screen and it pops up with the error "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). I have only got this error today, it was fine yesterday. I don't know how to fix it and it's frustrating. I've repaired my League and it didn't help I also deleted the folder  "lol_patcher" at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects and that didn't work either (I saw a post that it might help). Please leave any suggestions! Thanks. 
{{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body: i am having the same problem. have you get it fixed yet?
Yes. Upgrading to Windows 10 worked twice. Try it!

When I upgraded to Windows 10 and loaded up a custom game it ran fine no errors. But the my dumbass was like "It might work on Windows 7 now"... which it didn't. Upgrading now though. Try upgrading if you can, you can always revert the update if it doesn't work.

Do you have lolreplay installed? If so, then this is more than likely the cause.

Disable lolreplay and attempt to play a CUSTOM game, let me know if this helps.
I did have it installed. I just uninstalled it and it didn't work. I'll try restarting my PC.
